title: Dangerous BlogWalking
summary:
Seen at HipTop.com:

Hiplogs Online Journals?It's your chance to be a star! You and your trusty T-Mobile Sidekick, that is. Share your deepest thoughts or wildest whims online with a public journal you can update on the go!
See? BlogWalking is a nascent meme! Or something. Yeah!

Archived Comments

  • Jeff Winkler
    2002-10-03T11:25:31
    I've blogged at a traffic light with the Hiptop :) Hope someone does a chording keyboard that plugs into the USB port (Bluetooth would be cool here), for faster one-handed typing. Impressions of the Hiptop, after two days: http://jw.servebeer.com:8080/space/
